article: secretary of state colin powell said thursday that abuses by government-supported arab militias in sudan qualify as genocide against the black african population in the darfur region _ a determination that should pressure sudan 's government to rein in the fighters .
abstract: u.s. seeks to pressure sudan to ease suffering in its darfur region
